MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KY5 postcode area of Lochgelly. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:42pm. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:44pm on Thursday, 22nd April 2021
